title: Pixel 4a.headset with mic; then just a "woosh" is heard n nothing get recorded or transmitted.
content: Using a Pixel 4a. I have connected a headset with a mic and trying to make calls. The earphones work fine, but not able to transmit audio. I tried recording to test, I only hear a "woosh" kind of sound and then the mic works no more. Happens anywhere I try to use the microphone with the headset. The headset and microphone works well with other devices.
